messages.title: Jobs and economy
messages.content: Job claimants down 58%, income tax cut for 30m, Conservatives give 30 million a tax cut.

messages.title: Conservatives keep mortgage rates low
messages.content: Labour's home-buyer rates hit 15% under Labour, current mortgage rates lower under Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cameron’s long-term economic plan is working.

mentions.candidate: Cameron says IDS welfare reforms are a modern day trailblazer.

issues.economy: Conservatives say 1,000 jobs created every day, Cameron’s long-term economic plan is working.
issues.socialWelfare: Cameron says IDS welfare reforms are a modern day trailblazer.

leaflet.personalStatement: Energetic and determined to keep Britain’s economy strong, living standards rising and prospects growing.

quotes.text: I’ve every confidence he will ensure we keep living within our means.
He’s one of the most experienced MPs, with advice I’ve come to trust.

images.caption: Sir Paul Beresford with supporters and residents.
Sir Paul Beresford in the constituency.
